newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: PRESS DIGEST - S.Korean newspapers - Feb 12.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - S.Korean newspapers - Feb 12.

text.p: The following is a summary of major South Korean political stories in leading newspapers, prepared by Reuters in Seoul. Reuters has not checked the stories and does not guarantee their accuracy. Telephone: (822) 727-5650. Fax: (822) 727-5666.
- State prosecutors yesterday arrested Chung Jae-chull and Hong In-gil on suspicion of receiving 200 million won and 800 million won.
- Extraordinary parliamentary session is expected to open on February 17.
- Korea's 200 major firms are expected to cut their domestic facility investment this year as slumping exports and sagging domestic sales have sapped their investment confidence.
- The central Bank unveils financial reform proposal: the package was submitted to the presidential financial reform committee for deliberation.
